_header: If thou wilt be good and holy
_description: Moral precepts preceding a mystical prose devotion in style of Rolle

Lam546.Transcription:
If thou wylt be good and holyThes viij rules kepe thou trulyWho
                    kepe hem in all ther lyuyngShall come in thys in thys lyfe to
                    awynWonderfull loue brynnyngThey shal tast here of goddys
                    loueThat angels in heuyn fele aboueOf lykyng and swetness they shall
                    assayMore then eny creature tell may
Lam546.Attributed Title:
Thes be the viij rules Doo well Greue not Suffyr Flee Wake Wepe Pray and
                    loue. Thys ys hampul doctryne & her folowyth hys prayer (f.
                        53v)
